weakness.name: Undetected changes in network configuration
weakness.desc: Changes in network configurations (NACLs, route and gateway tables) are not detected because monitoring and alerting on the network is not configured to detect these changes.

test.steps:
1. Go to "Monitor" and then to "Alerts".
  2. Check that there is any rule to notify when the VPC NACL changes.
  3. Check that there is any rule to notify when the VPC route table changes.
  4. Check that there is any rule to notify when the VPC gateway changes.
  5. Check if these rules are enabled.
